publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2329# Lord James Douglas-Hamilton:Rail Links in Central Belt of Scotland—That the Parliament supports the creation of rail links at Edinburgh and Glasgow airports as developments which will benefit the citizens of Scotland, tourists and employees of businesses, industry and commerce throughout the lowland belt and which will develop and advance the competitiveness of the Scottish economy in Scotland’s best interests. Supported by: David McLetchie*

S2M-2329# Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Rail Links in Central Belt of Scotland—That the Parliament supports the creation of rail links at Edinburgh and Glasgow airports as developments which will benefit the citizens of Scotland, tourists and employees of businesses, industry and commerce throughout the lowland belt and which will develop and advance the competitiveness of the Scottish economy in Scotland’s best interests. Supported by: David McLetchie
S2M-2329# Rail Links in Central Belt of Scotland (lodged on 26 January 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2329 #Rail Links in Central Belt of Scotland (lodged on 26 January 2005) Nora Radcliffe*
